snippet: The New York Philharmonic, under Alan Gilbert’s conducting, continues its exploration of the Danish composer Carl Nielsen at Avery Fisher Hall.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews concert of works by composer Carl Nielsen, performed by New York Philharmonic, at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: The New York Philharmonic, under Alan Gilbert’s conducting, continues its exploration of the Danish composer Carl Nielsen at Avery Fisher Hall.

headline.seo: New York Philharmonic Continues an Exploration
headline.main: Grandeur, Delicacy and Duels in Nielsen Symphonies
headline.print_headline: Grandeur, Delicacy and Duels in Nielsen Symphonies
